docstring.long_description:
For example if you query a VISA instrument with "*IDN?" using a
SERIAL_WRITE block, this block must be used to return the response.

Not required if the PROLOGIX_AUTO setting is "on" (not recommended).

Requires an OPEN_SERIAL block.
docstring.short_description: Returns the response from the GPIB instrument.

parameters.name: connection
parameters.description: The open serial connection with the instrument.

returns.description: Response from the Prologix USB-to-GPIB controller.
